item.title: Call Go functions from browser JavaScript with WebAssembly
item.description: Pushing the button, the function implemented in Go is called, and it updates the value of text. $ go version go version go1.18 darwin/amd64 Go can refer variables and call functions in js with syscall/js package. By breaking changes of Go 1.12, NewCallback() is renamed to FuncOf(). The function must return the value that has a type js.ValueOf() expects, so if returns a struct, an error occurs. package main import ( "strconv" "syscall/js" ) func increment(this js.
